Bioreactor module

src.vLab.IntegratedBioprocess.Bioreactor.bioreactor(t, x, theta, u_F, u_Cin)[source]

Compute the derivative of bioreactor simulator, which is a first order ODE system

\[\frac{dx}{dt} = \text{bioreactor}(t, x, \ldots), x(t_0) = x_0\]
Parameters

  • t (float) – time

  • x (array) – state at time t

  • theta (CellCultureModel) – bioreactor model parameters

  • u_F (array) – feed rates at time t

  • u_Cin (array) – inlet concentrations at time t

Return array dxdt

derivative of cell culture

src.vLab.IntegratedBioprocess.Bioreactor.bioreactor_julia(t, x, theta_M, theta_P, u_F, u_Cin)[source]

Compute the derivative of bioreactor simulator, which is a first order ODE system

\[\frac{dx}{dt} = \text{bioreactor_julia}(t, x,\ldots), x(t_0) = x_0\]
Parameters

  • t (float) – time

  • x (array) – state

  • theta_M (array) – parameters related to cell growth

  • theta_P (array) – parameters related to product

  • u_F (array) – parameters related with feed rates

  • u_Cin (array) – parameters related with inlet concentrations

Return array dxdt

derivative of cell culture
